price: i Semud i Lutov narod i stanovnici Ejke; oni su baš bili udružene skupine!
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
